item.description: On Thursday, September 27, at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “Thoughts on the Cantorian Disproof of an Omniscient God,” an open discussion, based in part on Patrick Grim, “Problems with Omniscience,” www.pgrim.org/articles/omniscience9.pdf (especially pp. 5-6). Location: Rm. 442, BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to all. For more information, please email DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: Disproof Atheism Society meeting on Problems with Omniscience
